sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.adapters

Class DocumentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.AbstractRegistrable
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.Adapter
        • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.adapters.DocumentAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.jface.text.IDocumentListener, Listener, DocumentListener, Registrable

    public class DocumentAdapter
extends Adapter
implements DocumentListener
    An abstract adapter class for a DocumentListener. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as convenience for creating listener objects.

    Extend this class to create a DocumentListener and override the methods for the events of interest.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
    See Also:
    Adapter, DocumentListener
